summary: Refactored himalaya keybindings: removed <leader>me subgroup conflict, changed <leader>ma to <leader>mA for switch account, added email preview <leader>m mappings, updated sidebar/list keymaps (c=folder, e=compose), updated all help messages.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting all keybinding changes and verification results

completion_data.completion_summary: Refactored himalaya keybindings to eliminate <leader>me subgroup conflict. Changed <leader>ma to <leader>mA for switch account, added email preview <leader>m mappings (reply, forward, delete, archive, compose, search), updated sidebar and email list keymaps so c=change folder and e=compose, and updated all help messages.
